00005 #include <assert.h>
00006 #include <nacl/npapi_extensions.h>
00007 #include <nacl/npupp.h>
00008 
00009 // This file implements functions that are used by the plugin to call into the
00010 // browser.  Note that the NPN_* functions defined by the NPAPI are provided
00011 // by the Native Client runtime.
00012 
00013 // Pepper extensions.  These get filled in when NPP_New is called and
00014 // populated with pepper extensions in the NPN_GetValue call below.
00015 static NPExtensions* kPepperExtensions = NULL;
00016 
00017 // Chrome specific, this function calls GetValue to get Pepper extensions
00018 // made available to the plugin, |instance|.
00019 // Declaration of NPNVPepperExtensions: npapi_extensions.h
00020 void InitializePepperExtensions(NPP instance) {
00021   // Grab the Pepper extensions.
00022   NPN_GetValue(instance, NPNVPepperExtensions,
00023                reinterpret_cast<void*>(&kPepperExtensions));
00024   assert(NULL != kPepperExtensions);
00025 }
00026 
00027 // These are Pepper extensions.  Gets a higher-level device from
00028 // the pepper interface.  For example audio, 2d and 3d devices.
00029 // Returns NULL if device could not be acquired.
00030 // Decaration of kPepperExtensions::acquireDevice: npapi_extensions.h
00031 NPDevice* NPN_AcquireDevice(NPP instance, NPDeviceID device) {
00032   return kPepperExtensions ?
00033       kPepperExtensions->acquireDevice(instance, device) : NULL;
00034 }
